title: Setting the scene designer interviews: Chris Kennedy
brief_description: A co-production between AFTRS and ACMI for ACMI’s Setting the Scene exhibition. Chris Kennedy talks about the two different approaches he took for two films, the building of a town in The Proposition and finding already existing locations for The Road. This was part of the Landscape Spaces section of the exhibition.
